document_data.name: Iltztran Melarn
document_data.mainbody: '''Iltztran Melarn''' was the house wizard of [[House Melarn (Menzoberranzan)|House Melarn]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: Iltztran was a wizard from [[Ched Nasad]] and an [[arachnomancer]]. He survived the destruction of his home city in [[1372]] and joined House Melarn of Menzoberranzan as house wizard.
document_data.Personality: Iltztran was always in fear of Menzoberranzan falling like Ched Nasad had fallen, and used all his resource to stabilize the House Melarn complex.
